entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
